The medicine was mentioned on discharge summary with no dosage guidelines *** **** * ****** **** **** ** *** ******* ********** *** *** ****** *** ** ****** But when I asked for clarification regarding what alternate medicine should be given they told me to pay and get her consultation just to get this clarified.
Highly unprofessional. Would never recommend her.

review: My cloudnine  experience is horrible ...even for a vaccine we have to consult doctor *** ** ******.. our call with her lasts 5 mins for which we have to wait 45 mins when she will be available for video call n then get the vaccination prescribed.. they make you pay 800 for consult even though we don't have any reason for check up. Better to look outside as this is a not patient friendly.
